Traits.Name: Harvest's Vigilance
Traits.Content: The Kusa Sumashi can sense any disturbances to natural areas within 1 mile of its location. This awareness allows it to anticipate intruders and take actions to protect the land.

Traits.Name: Spirit's Resilience
Traits.Content: The Kusa Sumashi has advantage on saving throws against being grappled, restrained, or incapacitated due to its incorporeal nature.

Traits.Name: Spellcasting
Traits.Content: The Kusa Sumashi's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells: At will: druidcraft, thorn whip, entangle. 1/day each: speak with plants, barkskin, summon animals.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Kusa Sumashi makes two attacks: one with Harvesting Scythe and one with Binding Grasp. Under certain circumstances, it can use Cursed Touch in place of one other attack.

Actions.Name: Harvesting Scythe
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone as the Kusa Sumashi swings its scythe with unearthly force.

Actions.Name: Binding Grasp
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) necrotic damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 16) until the grapple ends, as the spectral essences of the land envelop them.

Actions.Name: Cursed Touch
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) necrotic damage. The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failure, the target's movement speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.
